heading: what does it do?
subheading: this big fiberglass pod comes with options, just like a car. the three lids on top can be impact-resistant or fully bulletproof. and you can boost performance with add-ons like a diesel engine, cb radio, activated-carbon air filter, and remote start package. you might park it out back for emergency use – could come in […]
author: wired staff
text: this big fiberglass pod comes with options, just like a car. the three lids on top can be impact-resistant or fully bulletproof. and you can boost performance with add-ons like a diesel engine, cb radio, activated-carbon air filter, and remote start package. you might park it out back for emergency use - could come in handy at millennium's end - but don't expect to take it on the road.what is it, anyway? and what does it do?the wired contestthe rules: for a chance to get out and enjoy the open road on a harley-davidson sportster, identify the item pictured at right (by manufacturer or designer) and its function. correct entries will be placed in a random grand prize competition, with one winner drawn early next year awarded a harley-davidson xl 1200s sportster. for contest rules, prize information, and the answer to august's "what does it do?" click here.__ win a harley-davidson xl 1200s sportster __
